Reference

DrugBank Database Loading

Read DrugBank database and load it into memory for later processing

read_drugbank_xml_db()

Reads DrugBank xml database and load it into memory.

Collective Parsers

Each function return related parsers together

cett()

Run all CETT related parsers

drugs()

Run all drug related parsers

run_all_parsers()

extracts the all drug elements and return data as list of tibbles.

Carriers, Enzymes, Targets, Transporters Parsers

Get Drug carriers, enzymes and transporters and related information

carriers_actions() enzymes_actions() targets_actions() transporters_actions()

Carriers/ Enzymes/ Targets/ Transporters Actions parsers

carriers() enzymes() targets() transporters()

Carriers/ Enzymes/ Targets/ Transporters parsers

carriers_polypep_ex_ident() enzymes_polypep_ex_ident() targets_polypep_ex_ident() transporters_polypep_ex_ident()

Carriers/ Enzymes/ Targets/ Transporters Polypeptide External Identifiers parsers

carriers_polypeptides_go() enzymes_polypeptides_go() targets_polypeptides_go() transporters_polypeptides_go()

Carriers/ Enzymes/ Targets/ Transporters Polypeptide GO Classifier parsers

carriers_polypeptides() enzymes_polypeptides() targets_polypeptides() transporters_polypeptides()

Carriers/ Enzymes/ Targets/ Transporters Polypeptide parsers

carriers_polypeptides_pfams() enzymes_polypeptides_pfams() targets_polypeptides_pfams() transporters_polypeptides_pfams()

Carriers/ Enzymes/ Targets/ Transporters Polypeptide PFAMS parsers

carriers_polypeptides_syn() enzymes_polypeptides_syn() targets_polypeptides_syn() transporters_polypeptides_syn()

Carriers/ Enzymes/ Targets/ Transporters Polypeptide Synonyms parsers

Drug Groups parser

drug_general_information()

Drugs General Information parser

drug_groups()

Drug Groups parser

drug_interactions()

Drug Interactions parser

drug_intern_brand()

Drug International Brands parser

drug_manufacturers()

Drug Manufacturers parser

drug_mixtures()

Drug Mixtures parser

drug_packagers()

Drug Packagers parser

drug_patents()

Drug Patents parser A property right issued by the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) to an inventor for a limited time, in exchange for public disclosure of the invention when the patent is granted. Drugs may be issued multiple patents.

drug_pdb_entries()

References Parsers

Books, Links, Articles and Attachments parsres

drugs_articles() carriers_articles() enzymes_articles() targets_articles() transporters_articles()
